name: Da Who..?
description:
"Da Who..?" is a game about learning how different people are coping with the COVID crisis and the quarantine.
Each round, there will be a blind item question. The players will secretly answer who they think best fits the description among the people at home.
Each game will only take around 10‑15 minutes.

Ang "Da Who..?" ay isang laro tungkol sa iba't ibang ginagawa ng mga tao para harapin at kayanin ang krisis ng COVID at ang quarantine.
Bawat round, merong isang blind item question. Ang mga manlalaro ay sasagot ng patago kung sino sa bahay ang tingin nilang pinakaswak sa nilalarawan ng tanong.
Ang bawat laro ay mga 10‑15 minutes lang.

This project was made possible through the support of Kindernothilfe (KnH)- Germany
